articles.description: SEVERAL players could told they are being released at Wanderers today after meeting with manager Ian Evatt.
articles.content:
WANDERERS begin building towards a promotion push for next season by holding talks with their entire first team squad today.
Ian Evatt will meet with his players individually at the University of Bo… [+2452 chars]

articles.author: Ian Herbert
articles.title: Brilliant stadium, fans onside and Son-Heung Min up top... What more does Antonio Conte want? - Daily Mail
articles.description: IAN HERBERT AT THE TOTTENHAM HOTSPUR STADIUM: It is hard to imagine a conversation with Daniel Levy resolving things this summer, given that the budget didn't even satisfy him at Chelsea .
articles.content: Antonio Conte was in another of his dark outfits and spent much of the 90 minutes with a face like thunder, fulminating, pointing and generally living up to that image as the Godfather on the T-shirt… [+5087 chars]

articles.author: Caleb Sage
articles.title: Aston Villa: Gerrard could 'pull the plug' on £33m signing at Villa Park - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Aston Villa could “pull the plug” on signing Philippe Coutinho from Barcelona this summer after the Brazil international’s recent dip in form.
articles.content:
Aston Villa could “pull the plug” on signing Philippe Coutinho from Barcelona this summer, according to transfer insider Dean Jones.
The Midlands club can sign the loanee permanently for £33m, but J… [+2311 chars]

articles.title: Domenico Tedesco in Rangers gamble as RB Leipzig boss focusses on Bundesliga to earn Champions League spot - Daily Record
articles.description: The German outfit face Borussia Mönchengladbach on Monday just days before they travel to Ibrox for the huge Europa League semi final second leg.
articles.content:
Boss Domenico Tedesco states he will field the strongest possible RB Leipzig team against Borussia Mönchengladbach ahead of facing Rangers.
